item.description:
The secrets of the Tao are not hidden in a remote mountain temple of the Himalayas or in the dark matter at the center of the Milky Way.  Tao wisdom is elegantly and simply revealed through the poetic prose of Tao Te Ching, one of the most esteemed books of Eastern thought. The Tao Te Ching, an ancient Taoist book composed of merely 5,000 Chinese characters, has surpassed all but the Bible to become the second-most translated book in the history of human civilization.

Come join us for a mind-opening and life-changing discourse on the ancient wisdom of the Tao Te Ching. Start seeing the world through the looking glass of Tao. This introductory workshop will bring you a basic yet encompassing understanding of Taoist philosophies and practices in the context of modern life. It may also open the mystical gate leading to a life filled with peace, joy and enlightenment.

A $10-20 donation is requested to further the healing work of SunDo Mountain Taoism, a non-profit organization whose mission is to educate all who wish to learn about Taoist philosophy and practice.

45 Tao Te Ching
True perfection seems imperfect,
yet it is perfectly itself.
True fullness seems empty,
yet it is fully present.

True straightness seems crooked.
True wisdom seems foolish.
True art seems artless.

The Master allows things to happen.
She shapes events as they come.
She steps out of the way
and lets the Tao speak for itself.
item.name: Ancient Wisdom of the Tao Te Ching
